name: nodejs-express-sequelize-mysql
description: Node.js Rest Apis with Express, Sequelize & MySQL

scripts.sequelize-automate: sequelize-automate -t js -h neverleave0916.com -d farmin -u neverleave0916 -p Neverleave0920. -P 3307  -e mysql -o models2
scripts.sequelize-auto: sequelize-auto -h neverleave0916.com -d farmin -u neverleave0916 -x Neverleave0920. -p 3307  --dialect mysql -o './app/models'

author: bezkoder
